name: Nitro Neon Nightdrifting
description:
Riding your sturdy TurboSkateboard9000 (the extrem over-eqquiped edition with a spoiler on the back and the carbon rims) , nothing can stop you.

Ride on the highway of a city with a car accident problem in a dystopian future. Dodge, jump and slide around as if nothing could stop you on this frantic VR game.

Playtime :  10 min approximately

VR ONLY GAME - OCULUS RIFT/QUEST HEADSET REQUIRED

================================================

Controls :

  • Pull the handle at your left to start a run.
  • Crouch to accelerate
  • Get up to slow down
  • Balance left and right to straff sideways
  • That's it!
